description: Try our easy to follow Honey Soy Kebabs in Tortilla Wrap recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Honey Soy Kebabs in Tortilla Wrap Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place dressing ingredients into a small bowl. Stir until sugar has dissolved. Set aside.

Cut the cucumber in half lengthways and scoop out the seeds. Using a vegetable peeler, finely slice the cucumber into thin strips. Place into a bowl with wombok, carrot and onion. Add enough dressing to moisten.
BBQ kebabs for 6 minutes, turning until cooked through and well browned. Warm tortillas according to the packet instructions.
Lay each tortilla on a plate, top with some of the coleslaw and peanuts and then a kebab. Wrap the tortilla around the kebab and remove the skewer. Roll up.
